name: Decisive Battles of World War II: Korsun Pocket - Across the Dnepr
name_original: Decisive Battles of World War II: Korsun Pocket - Across the Dnepr
description:
Decisive Battles of World War II: Korsun Pocket - Across the Dnepr is a strategy game developed by Strategic Studies Group. It came out on 22-12-2003. Matrix Games published the game.
Decisive Battles of World War II: Korsun Pocket - Across the Dnepr is available on PC.
